hero_image.title: Hero image - Next.js nowoczesny development
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja z laptopem pokazującym kod Next.js i dashboard analytics na czystym workspace
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z kodem Next.js i dashboardem analytics na minimalistycznym biurku workspace
hero_image.prompt: Minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying Next.js code and analytics dashboard with performance metrics, white wooden desk, notebook with yellow pen, coffee cup, smartphone, natural daylight from window, clean composition, muted colors black white gray with subtle yellow accent, professional tech aesthetic, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: developer workspace laptop code modern office
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean minimalist workspace, natural lighting, professional tech aesthetic, no people visible

section_media.section: Sekcja: Dlaczego Next.js dominuje rynek w 2025
section_media.title: Wykres adopcji Next.js vs konkurencja 2024-2025
section_media.description: Porównawczy wykres słupkowy pokazujący wzrost popularności Next.js względem innych frameworków
section_media.alt_text: Wykres porównawczy popularności Next.js Angular Vue React w 2024-2025
section_media.prompt: Clean comparative bar chart showing Next.js adoption growth vs Angular, Vue, React from 2024 to 2025, professional infographic style, black and gray bars with yellow accent for Next.js, percentage values, minimalist design, white background

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean professional chart design, can use ChartJS library or Canva templates

section_media.section: Sekcja: Next.js App Router - przełom w budowaniu nowoczesnych stron
section_media.title: Diagram architektury App Router
section_media.description: Schema pokazujący różnice między Server Components i Client Components w Next.js 13+
section_media.alt_text: Diagram architektury Next.js App Router z Server Components i Client Components
section_media.prompt: Clean architectural diagram showing Next.js App Router structure, Server Components on left side connected to Client Components on right, arrows showing data flow, minimalist design with black lines and shapes on white background, yellow accents for key elements, professional technical illustration

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean technical diagram, minimalist lines and shapes, professional software architecture style

section_media.section: Sekcja: Wydajność biznesowa - dlaczego Next.js zwiększa ROI
section_media.title: Wykres ROI Next.js w czasie
section_media.description: Liniowy wykres pokazujący wzrost ROI po wdrożeniu Next.js w okresie 12 miesięcy
section_media.alt_text: Wykres wzrostu ROI po wdrożeniu Next.js w firmie przez 12 miesięcy
section_media.prompt: Clean line chart showing ROI growth after Next.js implementation over 12 months, ascending trend line in yellow on white background, percentage scale, professional business chart style, minimal grid lines, black text labels

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business growth chart upward trend line
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean ascending line chart, business-focused design, can create in Excel or Google Sheets

section_media.section: Sekcja: SEO i marketing - Next.js jako narzędzie do wzrostu
section_media.title: Infografika - Funkcje SEO Next.js
section_media.description: Pionowa infografika pokazująca 5 kluczowych funkcji SEO wbudowanych w Next.js
section_media.alt_text: Infografika funkcji SEO Next.js meta tags sitemap robots structured data
section_media.prompt: Vertical infographic showing 5 key Next.js SEO features: meta tags, sitemap generation, robots.txt, structured data, Core Web Vitals. Clean icons for each feature, numbered list design, black and gray colors with yellow highlights, professional minimalist style, white background

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Vertical numbered infographic with icons, Canva has excellent SEO templates

section_media.section: Sekcja: Koszty i zwrot z inwestycji - analiza finansowa
section_media.title: Porównanie kosztów Next.js vs tradycyjne rozwiązania
section_media.description: Tabela porównawcza kosztów development, hosting i maintenance
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównania kosztów Next.js versus tradycyjne rozwiązania webowe
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison table showing costs of Next.js vs traditional solutions, three columns: Development, Hosting, Maintenance, rows for each solution type, green and red indicators for cost levels, professional business table design, black text on white background

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional business table design, can create in Excel/Google Sheets or HTML/CSS

section_media.section: Sekcja: Praktyczny przewodnik wdrożenia Next.js w firmie
section_media.title: Screenshot Vercel deployment dashboard
section_media.description: Mockup panelu Vercel pokazujący proces deployment aplikacji Next.js
section_media.alt_text: Panel Vercel z procesem wdrożenia aplikacji Next.js deployment dashboard
section_media.prompt: Clean mockup of Vercel deployment dashboard interface showing Next.js project deployment process, modern UI design, deployment status indicators, build logs, domain settings, professional software interface aesthetic, highlighted deploy button

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Modern software interface, clean dashboard design, professional hosting panel aesthetic
